summary: A detective tries to hunt down a serial killer who broadcasts his murders live on the internet.

Aguirre|Marco Assante|Sam Douglas|Derek Lawson|Sam Mancuso|Nick Reidy|J.B. Soler|Jason Thomson|Siri Steinmo|Michael Cahill|Lee Clyne|Jason Dors Lake
title: Dot.Kill
